stories.original_headline: A Christmas tree 80 light-years wide appears in space
stories.original_summary: This Christmas, astronomers are highlighting a spectacular region of space that looks remarkably like a glowing holiday tree. stories.fantasy_headline: Celestial Sphere Reveals a Glowing Tree of Stars!
stories.fantasy_story: The Guild of Sky-Wizards has unveiled a wondrous sight in the Celestial Sphere! Far beyond the known realms, a vast region glows like an enchanted tree, made of newborn stars. These primal fires illuminate swirling clouds of cosmic dust, creating a spectacular and festive display for all to behold.

stories.original_headline: Scientists found a way to restore brain blood flow in dementia
stories.original_summary: A new study suggests that dementia may be driven in part by faulty blood flow in the brain. Researchers found that losing a key lipid causes blood vessels to become overactive, disrupting circulation and starving brain tissue. stories.fantasy_headline: Healers Uncover Cure for Fading Memory Sickness!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Guild of Healers has made a profound discovery regarding the Fading Memory Sickness. They found that a vital essence helps keep the mind's life-currents flowing smoothly. By restoring this missing essence, they could mend the troubled flow and bring clarity back to ailing minds.

stories.fantasy_headline: A Parent's Regret: Not Duplicating a Beloved Plush Beastie!
stories.fantasy_story: A youngling's parent shared a tale of woe concerning a beloved plush beastie. Inspired by a merchant's moving picture show, they realized the peril of having only one treasured companion. Alas, the magic of duplication was never sought for the favored 'Buddy,' leading to future anxieties.

stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Storytelling Guild's Golem-Scribes Yield No Great Magic!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Storytelling Guild embraced the new Golem-Scribes for their moving parchment tales. These enchanted automatons could mask time's touch on performers and conjure illusions of other realms. Yet, despite much effort, the year concluded with little truly grand magic brought forth by these new artifacts.
